Package ohos.aafwk.ability

Enum ContinuationState

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<ContinuationState>
      • ohos.aafwk.ability.ContinuationState
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Comparable<ContinuationState>

    public enum ContinuationState
extends Enum<ContinuationState>
    Enumerates the migration states of an Ability that has implemented IAbilityContinuation and is in a reversible migration process that allows the ability to be migrated back.

    The following example describes state changes in a migration process:

    The initial state of FooAbility on device A is LOCAL_RUNNING. If it is migrated to device B in a reversible way, its state on device A becomes REMOTE_RUNNING and that on device B becomes REPLICA_RUNNING. If it is migrated to device B in a non-reversible way, its states on both devices are LOCAL_RUNNING.

    Since:
    3
    SystemCapability
    SystemCapability.Aafwk#ABILITY

    • Enum Constant Summary

      Enum Constants 
      Enum Constant Description
      LOCAL_RUNNING
      Indicates that the ability is running on the local device.
      REMOTE_RUNNING
      Indicates that the ability has been migrated to another device.
      REPLICA_RUNNING
      Indicates that the ability was migrated from another device to the current device.
